value.title: Apple unplugs self-driving electric car project, reports say
value.excerpt: Apple has reportedly cancelled its plans to build electric vehicles (EV) a decade after the iPhone maker was rumoured to be working on the project. The firm has never publicly acknowledged the project, which involves around two thousand people.
